snippet: Assistant Secretary of State Kurt M. Campbell called on China to urge the new leadership in North Korea to refrain from military provocations during the transition of power.
abstract: Assistant Secretary of State Kurt M Campbell meets with senior officials in Beijing to ask China to help restrain the new leadership in North Korea from military provocations during the transition of power there.
lead_paragraph: Assistant Secretary of State Kurt M. Campbell called on China to urge the new leadership in North Korea to refrain from military provocations during the transition of power.

headline.seo: U.S. Envoy Asks China to Help Restrain North Korea
headline.main: U.S. Asks China to Pressure North Korea to Avoid Provocations During Transition
headline.print_headline: U.S. Asks China to Pressure North Korea To Avoid Provocations During Transition

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
